评论详情: This is super soft, comfy and lightweight. It is not too short for my long torso.
I was v pleasantly surprised at how nice this is! It is super soft with bright colors (the red is a pretty cranberry color). It does run long, but since I'm only 5'2 that's not unexpected.

This jacket is thin, but because the material has a sort of "plastic-y" feel, it's pretty warm. It's not bulky and a bit longer (over the hips) which I like. Good for layering. Has a weird, synthetic feel to it, but it'll work.

The hoodie arrived in good condition and fit as expected.  I ordered a size larger than normal because I wear it over my work shirt and don't want it to feel tight.  It is a little larger than I expected but it works perfectly for me.  I am rather sad that the inner pocket is only on the left side, I prefer one on each side or just the right side.  The jacket is nice and warm for cooler weather so I would not wear it in the summer months.  Overall, for the price, I would recommend it!
Not stretchy Barley kept me warm The fit was okay Style was great, it was same as picture Comfort was not all bad it just super tight and the zipper broke off
Looks great but is a lil bit tight!  Usually wear a Med. but could've used a Lg. in this!

Very comfortable and I like the longer length. The neckline is very open even when zipped up all the way so I need a scarf with this on a windy day. The sleeves are perfect if you have long and skinny arms as I do. Haven't washed it yet but the fabric feels durable enough.
Fits perfect and looks amazing. The fabric is comfortable and breathable, I’d buy again!
Not fleece inside, very thin and color was off than shown online but still nice for in between needs.
I love this jacket not to thick and very soft!
I love it. I'm 5'11 with long arms and both body and arm lengths are perfect.

评论概述: Mom loves fit (long and tight) BUT PILLS within 3 wears
评论详情: For the price, I did not expect pilling all over the front so fast (I only washed it by hand once).  Mom still likes it because she likes things that fit long, but it is very sad how fast the fabric gets damaged. Its pretty thin, but still ok for spring fall.
I liked the stretchy fabric and its color.
Great fit and so comfortable! Just what I was looking for.
Love these material. Lightweight. Comfy. True to size.

评论概述: Color shown in picture not accurate
评论详情: The heather green color shown in picture is not what arrived.  What I got was more blue.  I liked the material and would have kept it if color was correct but I returned it.
Sizing is true and fit is comfortable. I live the secret inside pockets for my phone.
Nicely made, I wanted something snuggly, this is warm and thin.

It's fine. Just a lot longer than I'd prefer. For reference I am 5'7, average arm length, average torso length. I did size up because I'm busty so maybe that's why it seems so long but it hits around mid-low butt and sleeves almost cover my thumbs. It's not bad, just fine. Not what I would've preferred
Es bonito y es perfecto solo que muy largo para mi se los voy a Dar a mi hija porque compre 2

Love the Jacket. It's so soft and comfortable! I wish it came in an xs. Sm came in just a tad big and long. I'm 5'3 110lbs (I work out). And though it's a bit big on me, I love it. I traveled from NY to VA in a 7hr car trip w my kids and I was comfortable the whole time. Not too hot n not too cold. I'm going to buy a couple more! Don't buy the ones with the obvious white inside lining tho! It looks terrible in person in my opinion. The white lining looks cheap. I returned the Grey n black one I bought. I thought it was going to look so cool. Instead it just looked terrible. 😬😕 but, that's just my opinion. Hoped this helped!
This jacket is nice, but runs big. I had to send back.
The product description is way off. It clearly states that this is a fleece lined hoodie. There is actually no lining at all, fleece ir otherwise.
When I received the sweater it was wrinkled. Few days later it is still wrinkled.
I ordered it a bit bigger to ensure it fits but it was really long. I love the feel of the fabric.
Exactly as described.  Perfect weight for cooler fall evenings. Soft comfortable. Athletic cut so size up if you like a looser fit.

评论概述: Great Jacket, sleeves a bit snug
评论详情: Great Jacket, sleeves are just a snugger fit than I like so my shirts bunch up underneath.
The hoodie itself if fine, however I purchased a new item, but received a used item. It had trash left in the pocket.

I like the feminine look and fit of this hoody. There's no lining so it's not bulky. I wore it with a collared golf shirt to a family dinner and received many compliments on my outfit. Update.. I bought the geometric one and I don't like it. The inside is white and it clashes with the outside colors. Kind of looks like scrubs. The color is grey and black , and the material doesn't feel the same, not soft and comfortable like the other 2 . I don't recommend it at all.

Although the size was accurate, thats all the positive I can say. It came wrinkled (hand-wash only) it's October (45°F) outside right now. Did not keep me warm. It just felt like wearing a thin long sleeve outside. You could still wear it, but it won't keep you warm for winter.
I'm 6' tall 190 #s and my concern is always sleeve and body length. This is perfect. I like a zipper for easy putting on and off and pockets. This hoodie is all those things.

Not your usual baggy or boring lightweight hoodie jacket, this one is more fitted, but also made with a stretchy material for comfort. I like the pattern and color and especially appreciate the hidden inside pocket!

The picture makes it looks like it’s fitted, but that would require darts in the stitching, there aren’t any. It is a straight seam, but I suppose if it’s tight it will be fitted because it stretches. I bought a large which is not tight on me, so it doesn’t have as much of a fitted look. The pockets are bigger than the photo and that’s a bonus. I can fit a couple IPhones and car keys in them. It’s very soft and comfortable. I’m 5’2 170 lbs with a large chest. It covers my butt because it’s so long. I would have preferred just below the waist. Large is baggy on me. Probably should have bought a medium, but I’m not returning it because it’s a great sweater. I may get another one in medium.
This jacket fits nice but it is thin, there isn't fleece in it like I thought would be.

评论概述: The Good the Bad and the Ugly!
评论详情: Other reviewers were right.  Should have paid more attention! The arms are pretty tight, don't like the white lining it is ugly.On the other hand, flattering fit.  I always like it when reviewers tell me their height and weight so I can judge.  I'm 5'8" and weigh 135.  My arms are not large at all, only a thin tee or tank will fit!
Love it
Thicker fabric, but not lined as I thought it would be. Still what I wanted, so I’m keeping. Nice transitional workout jacket. Feminine cut.

评论概述: Weird stretchy material, right around arms
评论详情: This is one of those weird overly stretchy athletic materials. The tie dye color is just printed on top, the inside of the jacket is white. It seems like it fits ok, but is a slim fit especially around the arms.  I really wanted this for layering, so the slim fit isn’t going to work for me.
Like the fit and look.
The jacket is a little thin for weather under 60 degrees. It’s great for an outdoor Fall summer workout. Great for layering and soft material.
Fits small needed to return

Only reason I give 4 starts is it runs a bit small but I bought a size larger. I wear large and bought an extra large. It will do well for riding on husband's motorcycle. It's long and zips up to the neck, which is what I wanted
Weird hood - doesn’t clasp anywhere but generally pleased with priduct
I really love this jacket! Good quality material and I love the way it fits and looks!

***Edit***I was contacted by Hibelle after placing my review. They apologized for me not being happy and had some options to correct what I wasn’t satisfied with. I chose to order a different jacket from them. Though I will say the product wasn’t 5 stars the customer service was 10 stars! They seriously went out of their way to make sure I was happy. I order the fleece zip up and the sleeves were a little stretched at the ends it was still a better product than the original. It’s very refreshing to have a company care about my review/satisfaction with product. Very happy with customer service cannot stress that enough. Thank you Hibelle ❤️  The neck part is seriously bigger than the waist. It’s really not worth the price I’d advise to look elsewhere. Cheap fabric and very poorly made does NOT look like the photo.
It is exactly the color I wanted.It matches and dark red/burgandy but since it is marbled with white, it is not dark. Good for a spring wrap.
I love this hoodie and wear it frequently. I will be ordering in more colors. I like the casual, comfy laid back look in my wardrobe,,so lots of hoodies, yoga pants and tennis shoes

评论概述: It’s a decent jacket it is sewn kind of weird though.
评论详情: The jackets material is good. Extremely soft on the inside and has a lot of stretch. I probably could have gotten one size up but I’m happy with it. The way the hood is sewn is a little strange to me and it’s tighter at the hips than it is at the top for some reason. I don’t normally zip it though so that’s not really an issue for me. I just have it as a light jacket for work and for what I paid for it I’m not too disappointed. 🤷🏻‍♀️

It wasn't what I was expecting,  but I like it, I love that is long,  and I ordered 1 size up and it's roomy but I wanted that so I can wear a sweatshirt under it,  I think its very flattering, I thought from the picture it had a contour in the waist,  but it doesn't,  but its still flattering, and I thought it was lined with fleece, but I must have read it wrong, but I like it anyway,  I got Black on Black and it looks very nice. I will wear it alot.
Thinnest fleece possible.

Pros: Looks cool, Material is nice, lightweight, comfy for slight cool weather or a bit more Cons: Hood does not work unless there is no wind flow as it doesn’t have adjustable hood strings Won’t keep you warm in winter Runs small

I love this zip up hoodie.  Soft inside. Stretchy. Comfy.  Nice color and material. Just wish they’d have put a better zipper in it. It’s very small and cheap plastic, and already doesn’t want to go into its spot.
Came quickly,  comfy fit and soft material.  I hope it holds up because it's really flattering.
The jacket is nice but runs small.
Looks more structured in the picture. I would not describe this as fleece lined. Very light weight and very soft, just not what I was expecting per the pictures and description.

This is a great sweatshirt. I really love it I bought a xlg it's a little snug around shoulders. Could've used a little more room I have more muscle in upper arms. But other than that it's a nice warm light weight jacket goes great under a vest.🙂
I have one already in a different color (maroon ish) but this black one fits differently. I love my other one and order a second but I’m not in love with this one.
I thought it was a warm sweater. It’s thin and not warm enough in cold weather. It’s nice to wear in cool weather

This is a lightweight zip up and it is very soft and comfortable !! I wear it on the days when I need a little something for warmth it’s not too cold out but it’s not hot. There is an inside pocket on this zip up that I put my keys in when I’m walking , and it does have your two regular pockets on the outside. When I wear it and if it’s someone I know I always say fill how soft this is….lol

This is very good quality, nice material and has a lot of stretch.  However it definitely runs small and you need to size up!  I always get a medium in jackets and sweatshirts and this is snug!  Wish I had ordered a large.

评论概述: Sleeves are short, and it overall fit is skimpy
评论详情: I usually wear a size medium in outerwear so I figured a size large would work to ensure the sleeves would be long enough. Wrong! Plus it seems to have shrunk after washing in cold water and hanging to dry.
It seems that the width of the arms are always tight.  I have lymphedema from cancer and my arms are large for a 3x.  The full figure female will have difficulty with this item.

评论概述: It came vacuum sealed-please stop doing that!
评论详情: I love these hoodies. I have purchased 3 now but this one came vacuum sealed and was so difficult to get the wrinkles out I almost sent it back, but I'd already cut the tags off it. I spritzed it with water - that did nothing. I washed it - no change. I finally had to iron it on a very low setting for 15 minutes to get the wrinkles out. While I was wearing it this weekend I realized I still didn't get out all the wrinkles so back to the ironing board. And it was so tedious! Grrrrrr...I will never keep anything that is vacuum sealed again. Clothing should not be vacuum sealed. Doing that literally assures that the wrinkles will never come out.
I would go a size lower than what you are - ran a little big but really attractive and soft material
Loved the fit. Well made. Great for morning walks and starting back up at the gym if you are self conscious. Wish the hood had a draw string. Still, I plan to order in more colors
Wanted to love it ! Material is very thin not worth $28 dollars.

I love it. Only complaint is, I wish I would have bought a size up. It fits but snug when I zip up.  It is a slimmer fit, no bulk. Fits great in the shoulders and I love the length.  I bought grey heather and I am looking at a wine or blue for my next purchase.***I now have 3.  Grey, burgundy and wine.  Love the overall feel and look.

I love the material and shape of this hoodie.  I ordered my usual size and it's small in the bust  I wear it zipped because open hits me more to the sides of my chest.  It does have a lot of stretch. I decided not to exchange because next size up is larger.  I kept it and am glad I did.

评论概述: Love it, but should've sized down
评论详情: Its really cute & lightweight and does well at keeping you warm in the cold. The material is stretchy but in my opinion the sizes ran a little bigger than usual. I usually am a small so thats what i got, and this fit almost like a medium normally does. The torso/mid section area is longer than i expected too, comes down almost past my butt. It really is a good hoodie and is able to be styled without issue.
Super light and cozy!

I love this hoodie,  bought one in blue heather and liked it so much I ordered the green heather (more like a teal green),  it is the perfect weight ...not too heavy but has a little body to it.  It is so comfortable, I wore it over a light long sleeve shirt on the boardwalk on a windy day 65 degree day and it was perfect.  Long enough to cover my butt but not too long like some tunics can be.  I bought an XL because I like them roomy but an L would have fit too if I Wanted it more fitted. I’m 5’6 and 160 lbs, usually wear a size 12.  Even the XL is flattering and hides a COVID tummy!
This jacket is comfy, athletic, and a great addition to my wardrobe! Love the color too… easy to match with much of my wardrobe!
I liked the color, pattern and material of this zip up hoodie. It is soft and comfortable and cozy.
Out of the package I am loving this. The sleeves are long enough. The torso is long enough. Love the color. Looks like it was made well.
I was expecting it to be a lil thicker on inside, however it is a nice looking jacket to throw on in the summer
Super soft n warm. Wear it daily basically. Breathable fabric n true to size.

评论概述: Great jacket but runs a size small
评论详情: I like that the jacket is a bit longer but definitely size up. I’m a large and will be returning this for an xl

Jackets are like their picture.  The one inner pocket is small but at  least it's there.  Feel like designed by a man who thinks women have nothing to carry.  The length of the jacket is perfect to go over my longer shirts and colors a bit different but nice.  I ordered 2 more colors after first blue.

评论概述: Comfortable and stretchy material, long length
评论详情: The material is great, stretches and soft. The inside has a slight fuzz to it “fleece” as they call it. It is lightweight but still warm. The only con so far is it’s starting to get balls on the outside from wear. I feel like that shouldn’t happen within a week or 2. Color is great too. A pretty burgundy red. The length is longer than an average zip up which is nice to cover your hips.
Color and material was great but if your not tall this hoodie goes past your hips and looks very frumpy.

评论概述: FYI: If you're looking for something with a little warmth, keep browsing: this one's not it.
评论详情: As stated, the jacket is not lined/warm. It's just okay-looking. I don't hate it, so I won't return it, but knowing myself, I will likely end up giving it to one of my friends. :)

I love it so much I will be buying several different colors it's absolutely comfortable and warm but also thin enough to wear under a jacket if needed especially if you don't like wearing coat during the winter season.
This is comfy and decently warm for spring. This runs small but looks good.
It fit snugly and was very pretty.
I take a size 8 dress or pants, and this size medium hoodie is snug on top and longer than my other hoodies, but flattering.  If you need to move/twist a lot in it, buy one size larger than usual.
Jacket could have been lined better.  It was a little misleading online.  It's just okay to me.
This is not what I was expecting. It was very thin and it was not made of fleece material.

Ordered an extra large(all the extra must be in length lol), normally wear large. Its a tight fit, especially in the arms. Need toothpicks for arms for it to be comfortable. Extremely light weight, don't even want a light breeze if its not really warm out. Super soft and stretchy though.
Love it, but there were a couple stains in the fabric.  I returned it for a replacement of the same hoodie because it’s so cute.

评论概述: Runs small. Order one size up.
评论详情: Love the quality. Order a size up.
Love the length, material and fit. Just love it!

评论概述: Came in in package that made it very wrinkly
评论详情: Fit a little snug

评论概述: If it only had a draw string around the hood!
评论详情: Extremely soft and comfy! bought a size or two larger than my normal size and it's a good fit. It would be a perfect lightweight jacket if it had a draw string around the hood.

Recommend buying a size or 2 bigger if you dry plan on placing in the dryer. Shrinks quick & a good amount. Also, the jacket is very clingy to other long sleeve shifts. Can be a struggle getting off. Material feels nice other then that.
Exactly what 8 was looking for and well made
Soft inside and just perfect, covers my bum!

评论概述: Not all colors are fleece lined!
评论详情: I ordered this sweatshirt in two different colors, heather green and blue. The heather green has a soft fleece lining as stated in the description. The blue is much thinner and is not fleece lined. I’m sure this was not a fluke because I ordered the blue in two sizes and neither were fleece lined. I’m returning the blue, not nearly as cozy.

I love this jacket so much I have three of them. The fabric is fairly thick but still breathes, it is very soft and cozy. The length is perfect for some modesty with leggings and the pockets are deep enough that my phone does not fall out.

评论概述: Size small is more like a medium.
评论详情: I wish the company made XS as their small is way too large.  I've ordered other sweatshirts from them and they are all too large, but this one was even more so.
It’s cut small so I had to reorder a xxl. Material is soft will be nice under my vest so not to be bulky. Thanks
